lead_paragraph: In the rush to serve clients keen to open ruble accounts, staff at the first Russian bank to open its doors in Crimea have yet to find time to open the boxes stacked in the entrance or put up a proper sign.

headline.main: Sanctions Trump Patriotism for Russian Banks in Crimea
headline.print_headline: Sanctions Trump Patriotism for Russian Banks in Crimea

snippet: In the rush to serve clients keen to open ruble accounts, staff at the first Russian bank to open its doors in Crimea have yet to find time to open the boxes stacked in the entrance or put up a proper sign....
